isNull
===
> Test if a value is null.

<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var isNull = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-null' );
```

#### isNull( value )

Tests if a `value` is `null`.

``` javascript
var value = null;

var bool = isNull( value );
// returns true
```
<!-- </usage> -->

<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples


``` javascript
var isNull = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-null' );

console.log( isNull( null ) );
// returns true

console.log( isNull( undefined ) );
// returns false
```
<!-- </examples> -->
